name: BOTS AND CABLES GMTK 2021 EDITION
description:
READ THE ENTIRE DESCRIPTION FIRST!

NOTE: This game is only the first level, for now. I was working on story elements and more levels but I ran out of time during the jam. I will release an update on June 24th adding all of the stuff I did not finish during the jam.

Also this game is VERY buggy since I ran out of time.

Summary: BotBuild95 is a company that has always built the best work-related robots

But they just screwed up big time...

Model 6 and 6X have a rebuilt travel mode, but the coders got drunk for the release and they forgot to patch something, so it's up to you, Taylor, to link the robots back to the server to shut them down and collect valuable LINK data that they collected before this mess.

If your legs break that is not covered by your insurance BotBuild95Care employee insurance.

Controls:

WASD Movement

Space/Shift  -  Continue

Mouse left click  -  Shoot connecter cable

Mouse right click  -  Shoot X3connecter cable

Get to the goal at the end of the level with a specific amount of LINK data before your legs break from the bots. Remember, try to link together cables, attacks, and let bots bump into each other to collect more data!

Level 1 data needed  -  18000
